1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: In the series premiere of this bisexual reality dating series, The Bi Life cast meet each other for the very first time and settle into their Spanish villa, ready for a long, hot summer of dating ahead of them. Shane meets the cast at the villa and later on over dinner drops the news that Ryan will be heading off on a Gender Blind Date whilst Michael, a 24 year old dating virgin, must pick his favourite of three profiles to go on a date with. Opting for a school teacher, he goes on a nerve-racking first ever date whilst the rest of the cast watch back at the villa ...

imdb.plot outline: "The Bi Life" is a reality dating series following a group of bisexual+ or questioning British singles as they set out to find love abroad in Barcelona. While living and partying together, the singles help each other through the highs and lows of bisexual+ dating, as they form new friendships, find romance and explore their identities.
imdb.title: The Bi Life
